snippet: Utility and consumer stocks took losses on Tuesday. Earlier, bank stocks across Europe fell after the results of a stress test on Friday....
abstract: Stocks fall as investors fret about state of United States economy.
lead_paragraph: Utility and consumer stocks took losses on Tuesday. Earlier, bank stocks across Europe fell after the results of a stress test on Friday.

headline.main: Wall St. Falls, Led by Consumer Companies
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Slides as Insecurity Spreads
